participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: outgoing and friendly, enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: active and health-conscious, always looking for new ways to stay fit.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.
